definition: see 西沙群島|西沙群岛[Xi1 sha1 Qun2 dao3]
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea

sentences.english: The method of the determination of cisapride in tablet by HPLC was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了測定西沙必利片含量的HPLC法。

sentences.english: A friend helped me find my first job as a general labour in City of Mississauga.
sentences.chinese: 經朋友介紹，我在密西沙加市找到了第一份打工。

sentences.english: As for chronic sinusitis, Moxifloxacin or Cefepime is the first choice.
sentences.chinese: 慢性鼻竇炎治療首選莫西沙星或頭孢吡肟。

sentences.english: This is the case with virtually all the islands being disputed on Paracel and Spratly archipelagos.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有在西沙和南沙有爭議的海島都屬於這種情況。

sentences.english: A reliable math tool was provided to develop the freshwater resources on the coral island scientifically.
sentences.chinese: 爲科學開發西沙地下淡水資源提供了可靠的數學工具。

sentences.english: Furniture Store Mississauga is a toronto based retail store .
sentences.chinese: 傢俱店西沙加是多倫多的零售商店。

sentences.english: Yuanyuan, here is the Xisha Wetlands.
sentences.chinese: 淵源，這裏就是西沙溼地。

sentences.english: It wasn't until after China incorporated the Paracels into its Quang Dong Province that France began to pay attention to Hoang Sa.
sentences.chinese: 直到後中國納入其廣東省的西沙，法國開始關注黃沙。

sentences.english: Hand off our Spratlys and Paracels before it would be too late.
sentences.chinese: 交班南沙和西沙羣島我們面前的將是太晚了。

definition: Paracel Islands, in the South China Sea
Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam
Macclesfield Bank, series of reefs in the South China Sea southeast of Hainan Island
Huangyan Island (in the South China Sea)
East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
Hainan Island in South China Sea
Qiongzhou Strait (between Hainan Island and mainland China)
